nl: Prove that any two nonabelian groups of order 21 are isomorphic.
lean:
∀ {G H : Type*} [Fintype G] [Fintype H]
  [Group G] [Group H] (hG : card G = 21) (hH : card H = 21)
  (hG1 : IsEmpty (CommGroup G)) (hH1 : IsEmpty (CommGroup H)), Nonempty (G ≃* H)
imports:
import Mathlib

open Fintype Set Real Ideal Polynomial
open scoped BigOperators
